channel.title: Notes
channel.description:
[ul][li]Alg is an x rayer[/li][li]Krackid is an x rayer, and a speed hacker.[/li][/ul]
I know you'll all start a good old ramble, but this will help.

item.title: Notes
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yes, pampers is the biggest ban evader going. In fact if I remember correctly he IS Mr Mopar.

item.title: Notes
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Fuck I spent like 5 minutes typing up some shit and reply froze…

Edit:So Atteto logs in with the same ip area as kracky and all the greifers and gets yelled at for xraying. After I check his ip, I say I know its you kracky. He then switched to Sepelio under a proxy and makes the same smiley face Atteto made when I told him I know its him. I Ip ban Sepelio twice for using a proxy without banning the account. The third time Atteto is logged back on under the same proxy ip range as Sepelio. I also have all this screened.

I got all this shit figured out.

http://i56.tinypic.com/206jtax.png (pampers ips)
http://i51.tinypic.com/2z8x09j.png (matches atteto’s ip)
http://i54.tinypic.com/mtnpm0.png (Sepelio pampers/attetos under proxy)
http://i53.tinypic.com/2lbj3n6.png (atteto/pampers uder the same proxy)

Unless krackys ip is pampers then it wasn’t kracky and it was pampers. And I think pampers was a ban evader to begin with.

Read full topic

item.title: Notes
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Because I saw Krackid do it, and because it’s obvious with agl, a demoted and corrupt ex-staff member who has an obsession with the ground. I also know because he raided Badgers chests which where immpossible to see, behind 15 layers of smooth stone in the middle of nowhere, with no lights in, so he can’t abuse F so he’s clearly xraying and besides it all makes sense now, he did that to me a while back, and matty he’s had a long history for finding these things.

The chest required you to dig 15 blocks down in the sea, I mean come on?

Also:

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,498653.0.html

I am also suspicious that krackid xrays because of the fact he walked into my city and placed 5-10 diamond blocks, then left. Then claims he had a full chest, but reyx7 took some, even though it was hidden randomly, which could also trail on to accuse an entire group of people of xraying, which they post likely do.

comma rage

Read full topic
